title: Placements This Season
body:
So, finished silv s5 in s6, got placed b3 from winning 6/10 placements. Someone who finished the same and won the same placements got silv3.
Same as a few golds finshed S6 the same but one got placed higher then the other even though they won 9/10 placements. How do the placements even work now.

replies.body: Well im not sure, but i got gold last season and placed bronze 1, so thats not too bad a drop from s3 to b3
